subject: Welcome To  European Investmen
body:
Welcome To  European Investment Bank.
98-100 boulevard Konrad Adenauer, 2950 Luxembourg, Luxembourg
  I am not writing this mail to buy off your mind neither trying to push you against your wish but to ensure that at the end of this you will have every reason to smile at this institution and make a good recommendation of my person and I'm not out here or more less the almighty lord don't create me out to this world to  Cheat or scam people of their hard earned money so I will reject been such ever in my Life.
After this payment you are not going to make any other upfront payment as long as this transfer is concerned and failure to that you are empowered legally to sue the management of this institution for any damages you are to claim.
You can send the fee to this bitcoin wallet (bc1qykvenvwjjkg4r79zstq9t2aep3su4scp4ut77z )  .
I have waited for so long and we cannot continue to wait.
Sincerely yours,
Jean-Christophe LALOUX Director General,
Head of Operations, European Investment Bank
ONLINE BANKING TRANSFER

subject: Re: Welcome To  European Investmen
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's great to hear from the European Investment Bank. I must say, your message is quite intriguing.

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about this payment? What exactly is it for? And why is it necessary to send it via Bitcoin?

Also, could you provide some more details about this transfer you mentioned? What kind of transfer are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
